description: This file defines the ArxivTools class, which provides methods to search and read arXiv papers, including downloading PDFs and extracting text content from pages.

classes.name: ArxivTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for interacting with arXiv, including searching for articles and reading PDF content.

methods.name: search_arxiv_and_return_articles
methods.description: Searches arXiv for a query and returns a JSON string with top articles including metadata such as title, authors, PDF URL, and summary.

methods.name: read_arxiv_papers
methods.description: Downloads specified arXiv papers by IDs, extracts text from PDF pages, and returns a JSON string with the content.
